305180.name: Sniper Elite 3 - Target Hitler: Hunt the Grey Wolf
305180.description:
Target Hitler: Hunt the Grey Wolf is a one-of-a-kind assassination mission for up to two players in Sniper Elite 3.

A high level target has arrived in Tobruk for a surprise visit, but your intel paints a conflicted picture. Could it really be the Führer, or is it one of his rumoured doubles? With time running out can you infiltrate the city, pick a location and decipher the crucial ‘tell’ in time to take the shot?

Target Hitler: Hunt the Grey Wolf includes:

  • A whole new single player campaign mission for Sniper Elite 3.
  • SEVEN different ways to take down the Grey Wolf.
  • An expansive urban environment to explore and randomised clue locations - no two playthroughs will be the same!
305180.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 捷克语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
